item.title: about me
item.description: I am a Research Associate in Spatial Statistics and Epidemiology in the School of Public Health of Imperial College London. Previously I was a post-doc in the Department of Statistical Sciences of Sapienza University of Rome. EDUCATION @ Liceo Classico Tito Lucrezio Caro: 2010 – Maturità Classica @ Sapienza Università di Roma: 2013 – Bachelor in Statistics and Economics 2015 – Master in Statistics and Decision Sciences (EuroBayes program) 2019 – PhD in Metodological Statistics
